706166f-a.text:
(1)
Pacific Street, north side, between Third and Fourth Aves. In the background, is shown the upper floors and tower of the Williamsburg Savings
Bank Building.
May 11, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing a more westerly view of No. 1.
May 11, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

706166f-b.text:
(1)
Pacific Street, north side, between Third and Fourth Aves. In the background, is shown the upper floors and tower of the Williamsburg Savings
Bank Building.
May 11, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing a more westerly view of No. 1.
May 11, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

702244f-a.text:
Third Ave., at the S.W. corner of Pacific Street. In the foreground, is seen the proposed New York Times Building excavation at the S.E. corner of Pacific Street. Building concerned is the Swedish Evangelist Church.
January 26, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

706165f-a.text: Pacific Street, south side, just west of Third Avenue, showing Public School No. 47. September 9, 1930. Board of Education of the City of New York.

706163f-a.text: Pacific Street west from 3rd Avenue, Brooklyn. July 22, 1942.

702243f-a.text:
Third Ave., at and adjoining the S.E. corner of Pacific Street. Also shown is Pacific Street, south side, from and including Third, to but not including Fourth Aves. The view shows a frame house at No 6l Third Ave.
May 29, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

702245f-a.text:
63-65 Third Ave., east side, south of Pacific Street. The home with the iron balcony was once the property of one Whittlesey.
1992.
